It's a fun game! Trust me! Who needs high violence to make a game great and memorable. It uses a very good storyline and character development. Eventhough your character can't talk, but the  atmospehere of the game makes you feel that you are in the game itself.
A must have game if you haven't bought the game yet.

Very interesting story line. I want the old Valve back!

Yeah I've put a couple or so hours into the game and quite enjoyed it. Finished the singleplayer probably a few too many times and still not bored of it but for when I am there's always coop with a bunch new test chambers which I have also finished a  number of times, but wait there's more there are also so many workshop maps to play never leaving you bored with nothing to play. Overall a good game 11/10 would play again.
